resources.string: Choose | none | to prevent multi locker

Most lockScreens look the same, but locker doesn't
By combining the best features of every system's lock, we made this lockScreen that is informative,innovative,customizable yet easy to use.
 you will detach your current lock for this :D


Features:

 
✓ Clean interface
✓ Light weight
✓ Ram friendly
✓ Smooth on low end devices
✓ Customizable text 
✓ Customizable text color
✓ Battery percent
✓ lockScreens Gestures
✓ Changeable background image 
✓ Changeable background color
✓ Emergency unlock
✓ Material design
✓ Pin security 
✓ Customizable theme color
✓ Double tap to sleep
✓ Skip gestures on security
✓ Custom Shortcuts
✓ Missed calls counter 
✓ Unread Messages Count
✓ Pin Auto-unlock

This app is open sourced and signed under GNU Public License
 
Current Version 1.0.1

Creativity is our middle name. 

A tech development team 
 a group of teenagers with vision and mind. we want to make computer (PC, mobile..etc) users usage better and easier by offering new solutions. 

- What is our goal ? 
We were born to innovate, not to copy others. We follow this slogan as it is the bible, since our launch we have been creating ideas, or refining others, we will not settle for normal when we can reach for the stars. 

- Our philosophy ? 
To reach the greatest potential with your device and make you -the user- satisfied.by using our solutions, your life will be better.User comes first, all this work is for you, and every person is potentially a user, so you all matter to us.We work for you. 

- Why to use our apps ? 
By using our apps, if not for their awesomeness , you are supporting youth to create and show their minds, everyone deserves to think, and that is how we think. 

- I love your work, How can I support you? 
You can support us by simply by sharing our work and downloading it, you can donate soon too. 

- Why do you think you are different ? 
We love what we do, simple. 


Check our website : yez-Developers.com 
Follow us on Twitter : @yez_Developers 
Check our blog : blog.yez-developers.com
You have to enable Locker first
This is used to get access to some special permissions in device, for example turn off screen.
after enabling user will be able to use all the special features in locker.
Set The Lock Screen Text Color
In Case You Forgot The PassCode
Change The PassCode + The Lock Type
Change The Lock Background Image Or Color
